details: Mentored school students in Backend development using Node.js
Taught core backend technologies: JavaScript, TypeScript, Node.js, Express.js, NestJS
Introduced students to REST API development and database fundamentals (MongoDB, PostgreSQL)
Helped students understand complex backend concepts through practical examples
Reviewed homework assignments and provided constructive code feedback
experience.title: Mentor

details: Developed efficient and scalable RESTful APIs using Drizzle ORM and PostgreSQL
Optimized SQL queries, improving database performance and request speed
Prepared API documentation using Swagger, improving collaboration between frontend and backend teams
experience.title: Backend Developer Intern

details: Assisted instructors during backend development classes
Supported students with Node.js, JavaScript, Express.js, and database basics
Helped students debug code and understand backend logic
Checked assignments and tracked students' learning progress
experience.title: Teacher Assistant

personalInfo.bio: Backend Developer specializing in Node.js with hands-on experience in building RESTful APIs, working with SQL and NoSQL databases, and implementing authentication and authorization. Experienced in mentoring students and collaborating in team-based development environments.
personalInfo.name: Ali Ismoilov
personalInfo.title: Backend Developer (Node.js)

projects.description: Backend development of a food store automation system. Product & inventory management, sales, payments, expense & profit tracking. RESTful APIs with NestJS & TypeScript. JWT authentication and role-based access control. PostgreSQL with TypeORM, Redis caching. Dockerized and deployed on VPS. The project is currently under active development and uses test data only.
projects.title: Market Automation System (Backend)

projects.description: Backend for managing barbershops, staff, and customer appointments. Daily revenue, expenses, and customer statistics tracking. Search barbers and locations, profile management. RESTful APIs with NestJS & TypeScript. JWT authentication and role-based permissions. PostgreSQL with TypeORM.
projects.title: Barbers Management System (Backend)
